attributes.action: Make it illegal to take pictures and videos of children in public by strangers
attributes.additional_details: Make it illegal to take pictures and videos of children in public places with out consent because it become to often that parents are calling the police as there child has been photographed in public by strangers my own daughter and nice have been subject to this at just 6 and 8 years old its disgusting and should be made illegal and the law just simply take a statement just an intel report isn't enough thes pictures could be being sold to anybody sex traffickers pedophiles anyone saveourchildren
